rules_text:
Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Whenever enchanted player attacks with a creature, they lose 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Carry on 2 [i](When Disenchanted Youth dies, return it to the battlefield as an aura curse with vanishing 2.)[/i] [i](When Disenchanted Youth dies, return it to the battlefield as an Aura Curse enchantment with no other types and vanishing 2.)[/i]
